question: Where and when was Einstein born?
context: Albert Einstein (born 14 March 1879) was a German-born theoretical physicist who is widely held to be one of the greatest and most influential scientists of all time.
answer: Einstein was born in Germany on 14 March 1879.

question: What is the battery life of Model X?
context: Model X battery lasts up to 10 hours.
